resources.string: ASUS TUF Gaming FX505DY is a gaming laptop that has a high-speed Intel Core i7-7700HQ processor. This laptop has a 15.6-inch screen with a larger screen size than other laptop screens. This laptop has 8 GB RAM with high speed. This laptop has a 1 TB hard disk with high speed. This laptop has a digital clip camera with HD resolution. This laptop has a front camera with HD resolution.
